cast.overview: Real zombies arrive and terrorize the crew of a zombie film being shot in an abandoned warehouse, said to be the site of military experiments on humans.
cast.title: One Cut of the Dead

details.biography: In 2008, he joined the ENBU Seminar Video Actor Department, and after that he participated in the Tokyo Dry Battery Training School and the drama class ENTRYACT. In 2017, he participated in the audition for ENBU Seminar's 7th Cinema Project "Don't stop the camera!" The film's reputation spread through word of mouth and social media, and the number of theaters showing it expanded from two to more than 150, recording an unusual hit for an indie film.
details.name: Shuntarô Yamazaki
